nodes.text: The X-21 shock glove was a model of shock glove produced by Corellian Personal Defense and available during the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The gloves cost 500 and were designed to improve the damage done by hand attacks in melee combat.
The X-21 shock glove was first mentioned and depicted in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
